pages.text: The "vault looter" research is a good quality of life addition. It will when the Vault charm is in your inventory inside of a vault remove all the items that are picked up. BUT the items need to be specified in the VC Inscription table
Need to be in your inventory when running a vault to remove items picked up. ONLY WORK INSIDE OF VAULT
Here you specify what block the charm will delete when in a vault. Starts out with just 9 slots and can be upgraded later with upgrades for more slots
Needed to create your VC inscription table, can be found in "Vault troves crystals" and sometimes in the factory room in the vault (only 4 is ever needed)
First upgrade of the VC inscription table, have in your hand and then rightclick the table. Needs to be upgrade from 0-1 and 1-2 and so on, you can not go directly to level 3 upgrade
Need to be upgraded with T1 upgrade first. now will have 162 slots
Need to be upgraded with T2 upgrade first. now will have 1026 slots
